setup-worktree.script:
#!/usr/bin/env bash

set -e

SCRIPT_DIR="$(cd "$(dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}")" && pwd)"
cd "$SCRIPT_DIR"

echo "[worktree-setup] Checking dependencies..."

if [ ! -d "web/node_modules" ]; then
  echo "[worktree-setup] Installing web dependencies..."
  cd web
  npm install --legacy-peer-deps
  cd ..
  echo "[worktree-setup] ✅ Web dependencies installed"
else
  echo "[worktree-setup] ✅ Web dependencies already installed"
fi

MAIN_WORKTREE="${GIT_COMMON_DIR%/.*}/.."
MAIN_WORKTREE="${MAIN_WORKTREE%/.*}"
MAIN_ENV="${MAIN_WORKTREE}/web/.env.local"
CURRENT_ENV="web/.env.local"
ENV_EXAMPLE="web/env.local.example"

if [ ! -f "$CURRENT_ENV" ]; then
  echo "[worktree-setup] Checking for .env.local..."
  if [ -f "$MAIN_ENV" ]; then
    echo "[worktree-setup] Copying .env.local from main worktree..."
    cp "$MAIN_ENV" "$CURRENT_ENV"
    echo "[worktree-setup] ✅ .env.local copied"
  elif [ -f "$ENV_EXAMPLE" ]; then
    echo "[worktree-setup] Creating .env.local from example template..."
    cp "$ENV_EXAMPLE" "$CURRENT_ENV"
    echo "[worktree-setup] ⚠️  .env.local created from template - you may need to fill in values"
  else
    echo "[worktree-setup] ⚠️  .env.local not found - create it manually in web/.env.local"
  fi
else
  echo "[worktree-setup] ✅ .env.local already exists"
fi

if [ -f "infrastructure/spaceport_cdk/requirements.txt" ]; then
  if [ ! -d "infrastructure/spaceport_cdk/.venv" ] && [ ! -d "infrastructure/.venv" ]; then
    echo "[worktree-setup] Installing infrastructure dependencies..."
    cd infrastructure/spaceport_cdk
    python3 -m venv .venv || python3 -m venv ../.venv
    if [ -d ".venv" ]; then
      source .venv/bin/activate
    elif [ -d "../.venv" ]; then
      source ../.venv/bin/activate
    fi
    pip install --upgrade pip
    pip install -r requirements.txt
    cd ../..
    echo "[worktree-setup] ✅ Infrastructure dependencies installed"
  else
    echo "[worktree-setup] ✅ Infrastructure dependencies already installed"
  fi
fi

echo "[worktree-setup] ✅ Setup complete"
